item.title: Welcome to suzume!
item.description: suzume aims to be a fast, bloat-free Mahjong engine, on which servers and game clients, AI testbeds, and more can be built eventually. suzume only depends on a C++14 compliant compiler, and has no external dependencies. Localization has been a top priority in this project, with extensive support for Japanese and English terminology (more languages can easily be added!).
